Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class MainSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.MainSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController
public class MainSceneController extends Object implements SceneController
MainSceneController is the controller of the MainScene.fxml file. It manages the user action in the main scene of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainSceneController()
    Constructor method, creates an instance of MainSceneController and initializes all the attributes

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    confirmSpecial()
    Called when using special 7 or 10, when the button confirmSpecial is pressed, after the player chose which students wants to exchange
    void
    initializeScene()
    Used to initialize the scene when the InitializeMainService in GUI class is called Depending on number of players and expert mode value, sets visible the correct elements Maps the element of each schoolPane in a map The children of a schoolPane are: 0:schoolimageView, 1: entrancePane, 2: tablePane 3: professorsPane, 4: towerPane
    void
    islandsInitialization()
    Initializes the islands, setting the mouse click handler for each island
    void
    schoolsInitialization()
    Initializes all the schools, setting the color of the towers and the team, depending on the number of players It set for each school entrancePane and tablePane the respective click handler
    void
    setActionAllowed(int actionAllowed)
    Manages the action that the player can do on the MainScene in every moment of the game, and sets the labels 0 : student movement 1 : mother nature movement 2 : choose cloud 3 : special 1 4 : special 3 5 : special 5 6 : special 7 7 : special 10 8 : special 8 -1 : not your turn
    void
    setCardStudent(int color)
    Sets the student chosen from the card for special card 1
    void

    Sets the character for each player when the notify arrives
    void

    Set the turnLabel text and the actionAllowed to 0 if it's your turn

    Sets the value of expertMode

    Set the noEntry tiles when special 5 is in use, adding or removing them from islands
    void

    Shows for each player what was the last card they played
    void
    setMotherPosition(int islandRef)
    Called when the notify arrives, set motherNature imageView visible on the island where it is placed Mother nature is accessed by getChildren method, with index 1 (it is the same for every island)
    void

    Sets the new value of coins in expert mode for the player

    void
    setSpecialPlayed(int specialRef, int playerRef)
    Sets the label with the last special played when a player use it
    void
    setStudentsEntrance(int playerRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
    When the notify arrives, sets the students in the entrance of the respective school Students ImageView and Label are accessed by getChildren method on entrancePane Students ImageViews are from index 0 to 4 of the list, the labels are from index 5 to 9
    void
    setStudentsIsland(int islandRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
    When the notify arrives, sets the students presents on that island, setting the value of the correct label
    void
    setStudentsTable(int playerRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
    When the notify arrives, sets the students at the table of the respective school Based on the coordinates of the last student present at the school, it creates a new student at the table or removes the last one
    void
    setTowerColor(int islandRef, int newColor)
    Sets the color of the towers on an island, when it is conquered by a new team

    Initializes the table for each color of each school with the initial coordinates to the create the students at
    void
    unifyIsland(int islandToDelete)
    When two island are unified, deletes the correct one from the islandsPane
    void
    useSpecialButtonPressed()
    Called when the useSpecialButton is pressed on the main scene in expert mode If the movement of the student is allowed (moveNotAllowed is set to false), loads specialScene.fxml

    • setMotherPosition

      public void setMotherPosition(int islandRef)
      Called when the notify arrives, set motherNature imageView visible on the island where it is placed Mother nature is accessed by getChildren method, with index 1 (it is the same for every island)
      Parameters:
      islandRef - of type int - is the island where mother nature is

    • setStudentsEntrance

      public void setStudentsEntrance(int playerRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
      When the notify arrives, sets the students in the entrance of the respective school Students ImageView and Label are accessed by getChildren method on entrancePane Students ImageViews are from index 0 to 4 of the list, the labels are from index 5 to 9
      Parameters:
      playerRef - of type int - is the index of the player whose school is
      color - of type int - is the index of the color which number of students has changed
      newStudentsValue - of type int - is the new value of the students

    • setStudentsTable

      public void setStudentsTable(int playerRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
      When the notify arrives, sets the students at the table of the respective school Based on the coordinates of the last student present at the school, it creates a new student at the table or removes the last one
      Parameters:
      playerRef - of type int - is the index of the player whose school is
      color - of type int - is the index of the color which number of students has changed
      newStudentsValue - of type int - is the new value of the students

    • setStudentsIsland

      public void setStudentsIsland(int islandRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
      When the notify arrives, sets the students presents on that island, setting the value of the correct label
      Parameters:
      islandRef - of type int - index of the island where the student is
      color - of type int - index of the color of the student
      newStudentsValue - of type int - new value of the students on that island

    • setProfessor

      public void setProfessor(int schoolRef, int color, boolean newProfessorValue)
      When the notify arrives, sets the professor in the professorsPane of the school, showing if the value is true
      Parameters:
      schoolRef - of type int - the index of the school where the professor is
      color - of type int - the index of the color of the professsor
      newProfessorValue - of type boolean - true if the professor is present, false if not

    • setActionAllowed

      public void setActionAllowed(int actionAllowed)
      Manages the action that the player can do on the MainScene in every moment of the game, and sets the labels 0 : student movement 1 : mother nature movement 2 : choose cloud 3 : special 1 4 : special 3 5 : special 5 6 : special 7 7 : special 10 8 : special 8 -1 : not your turn
      Parameters:
      actionAllowed - of type int - the action allowed in that moment

    • setTowerColor

      public void setTowerColor(int islandRef, int newColor)
      Sets the color of the towers on an island, when it is conquered by a new team
      Parameters:
      islandRef - of type int - index of the island
      newColor - of type int - color of the team (0 is white, 1 is black, 2 is grey, -1 is none)

      isInhibited - of type int - the number of noEntryTiles on the island
